title: In-memory Engine: assertion failed: self.direction == Direction::Backward
body: ## Bug Report TiKV panic when preparing 1000 tpcc warehouses. ```log [2024/05/29 08:40:28.734 +00:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:477] ["assertion failed: self.direction == Direction::Backward"] at home/stn/tikv/src/coprocessor/inte ``` ### What version of TiKV are you using? Nightly, built on #16868 ### Steps to reproduce TiKV Config ```toml [range-cache-engine] enabled = true hard-limit-threshold = "8GB" soft-limit-threshold = "5GB" ``` TPCC commands ```bash /root/.tiup/components/bench/v1.12.0/go-tpc \ tpcc prepare \ -H $HOST -P $PORT \ -D tpcc100 --warehouses 100 -T 50 ``` ### What did you expect? No such error.

comments_data.body: This is due to that it does not support reverse the direction now: first seek and next, then prev. I will complement this part later.
